output.text:
On July 31, 2025, global financial markets experienced notable movements influenced by various economic data, corporate earnings, and geopolitical developments.

**Asian Markets:**
- Asian equities declined, primarily due to weaker-than-expected Chinese economic activity data and a significant 19.4% drop in copper prices. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/world/china/global-markets-wrapup-1-2025-07-31/?utm_source=openai))
- The Japanese yen strengthened by 0.6% against the U.S. dollar after the Bank of Japan raised its inflation forecast while maintaining interest rates at 0.5%. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/world/china/global-markets-wrapup-2-2025-07-31/?utm_source=openai))

**U.S. Markets:**
- The Nasdaq and S&P 500 futures surged, driven by strong earnings reports from tech giants Microsoft and Meta Platforms. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/world/china/global-markets-wrapup-2-2025-07-31/?utm_source=openai))
- Microsoft reported earnings per share (EPS) of $3.65 on revenue of $76.4 billion, surpassing expectations of $3.37 EPS and $73.9 billion in revenue. ([stl.news](https://www.stl.news/us-financial-markets-closed-mixed-on-july-30-2025/?utm_source=openai))
- Meta Platforms posted EPS of $7.14 on $45.5 billion in revenue, exceeding estimates. ([stl.news](https://www.stl.news/us-financial-markets-closed-mixed-on-july-30-2025/?utm_source=openai))

**Trade Developments:**
- U.S. President Donald Trump announced a 15% tariff on South Korean imports and a 50% tariff on copper pipes and wiring. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/world/china/global-markets-wrapup-2-2025-07-31/?utm_source=openai))
- In response, copper futures plummeted 19.4%. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/business/global-markets-view-europe-2025-07-31/?utm_source=openai))

**Top Stock Movers:**
- **Teradyne Inc. (TER):** Shares rose 19.37% to $108.09 following strong second-quarter results. ([swingtradebot.com](https://swingtradebot.com/news-articles/21998133-stay-informed-top-movers-within-sp500?utm_source=openai))
- **Generac Holdings Inc. (GNRC):** Shares increased by 18.5% to $179.31 after releasing earnings. ([swingtradebot.com](https://swingtradebot.com/news-articles/21998133-stay-informed-top-movers-within-sp500?utm_source=openai))
- **Humana Inc. (HUM):** Shares climbed 9.72% to $255.24, driven by positive earnings and raised full-year guidance. ([swingtradebot.com](https://swingtradebot.com/news-articles/21998133-stay-informed-top-movers-within-sp500?utm_source=openai))

**Market Indices:**
- **S&P 500 ETF (SPY):** Closed at $634.46, down 0.11%.
- **Nasdaq-100 ETF (QQQ):** Closed at $568.02, up 0.18%.
- **Dow Jones Industrial Average ETF (DIA):** Closed at $444.76, down 0.39%.

These movements reflect a complex interplay of corporate performance, economic indicators, and international trade policies impacting global markets.
